org.springframework.samples.petclinic.jpa
类 EntityManagerClinic

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.samples.petclinic.jpa.EntityManagerClinic
所有已实现的接口：
Clinic
@Repository
@Transactional
public class EntityManagerClinic
extends java.lang.Object
implements Clinic

JPA implementation of the Clinic interface using EntityManager.

The mappings are defined in "orm.xml" located in the META-INF directory.

从以下版本开始：
22.4.2006
作者：
Mike Keith, Rod Johnson, Sam Brannen

          Retrieve Owners from the data store by last name, returning all owners whose last name starts with the given name.

findOwners

@Transactional(readOnly=true)
public java.util.Collection<Owner> findOwners(java.lang.String lastName)
从接口 Clinic 复制的描述
Retrieve Owners from the data store by last name, returning all owners whose last name starts with the given name.

指定者：
接口 Clinic 中的 findOwners
参数：
lastName - Value to search for
返回：
a Collection of matching Owners (or an empty Collection if none found)

@Transactional(readOnly=true)

从接口 Clinic 复制的描述

参数：
id - the id to search for
返回：
the Owner if found
